name: Kicker for 2
description:
2 Players
4 Hands
On 1 Keyboard

What could go wrong?

Well, come and find out! This fast pace football simulation with intense gameplay and minimalistic design is the perfect game to play with a colleague while pretending to work. Just try not to kill him...

Features:
- Minimalistic Stadium
- 5 different player models
- A "Time wasted" counter
- Lots of fun

So what are you waiting for? First to 5 wins ...
